title: Riot listened to us about ADCs!
body:
I'm just so happy we got Riot to listen, repeatedly we told them they are so consistent and they heal for too much while mitigating too much damage, Riot announced that in preseason all will be well!

http://i.imgur.com/Fq1kioT.png[/img]

Now when ADCs heal for too much they get a shield! With a shield whatever damage reduction they have won't matter cause the shield will stop the damage from ever happening! 

And ADCs won't have consistent damage anymore! Because now whenever they attack, for 3-10 seconds they get 60% bonus attack speed! That means that they will deal more damage than usual, why does this matter? Because for 3-10 seconds you will have inconsistent damage! Thank you Riot! You listened and delivered just what we wanted!
